original_email.subject: Meeting Follow-Up
original_email.content: Hi, just checking in on the meeting notes.

edited_email: I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to follow up on the meeting notes from our recent discussion. If they are available, could you please share them with me? Additionally, if there are any key action items or decisions that need to be emphasized, I would appreciate your insights on those as well. Thank you for your assistance.
